This map shows the distribution of places, by type, within an isochrone for Helsinki, Espoo, Vantaa and beyond. Click somehwere to start! The places are categorized according to the type of activities that they primarily host: social, optional, or necessary, following the classification by Gehl. The travel-time isochrones are generated using the openrouteservice API. The place data is sourced from the Overture Maps release dated October 19, 2023 (places theme, confidence > 0.6). Mappings between the categories in the place data and the social, optional, and necessary categorisations were done manually.
